Khabi, nke a sụgharịrị Kabie (site na Chinese: 卡别), bụ asụsụ Southern Loloish nke Yunnan, China
A na-asụ Kabie na Jiangcheng Hani na Yi Autonomous County, Mojiang Hani Autonomoum County, na Lüchun County.
A na-enye ndepụta okwu Khabi nke e depụtaghachiri site na iji orthography Hani nke dabeere na Rom na Minta (n'afọ 2013) na Luo & Minta (n'afọ 2016).
